name: 罗伯特·莱曼
name_full: 罗伯特·莱曼 Robert L. Mann
introduction: 罗伯特·莱曼于1980年11月16日出生于加利福尼亚州戴利市，在科罗拉多州长大。他19岁时在洛杉矶开始了他的演艺生涯。他的母亲和父亲都是年轻的演员，罗伯特继承了他们的血统。罗伯特现在是一名作家、导演和制片人，住在布鲁克林，是一名独立的电影制作人。Born Robert Livingstone Mann in Daly City California, on November 16th 1980, Robert was raised in Colorado. He started his acting career in Los Angeles when he was 19 years old. Both his mother and father were young actors and Robert followed the lineage. Now a writer, director and producer, Robert resides in Brooklyn as an independent film maker.
